content: it s almost thanksgiving turkey stuffing and gravy mash potatoes cranberry sauce and pies this is the time of the year when we forget about our diets and just enjoy food until new year commitments here is an alternative that will distract you from guilty cravings a non-edible pumpkin pie this pattern is easy to make with step by step photos it will take you less time to make it than to bake a pie this is a cute decoration for thanksgiving or for your kids
